name: FARTernity
description:
In FARTernity you play as a gassy individual who is trying to cover up his farts with loud noises, smelly objects, and blaming others. It's a stealth game with no sneaking around, just using your environment to not be exposed of the smelly person you are. So try not to ruin the party with your farts okay?

[HOW TO PLAY]

Movement : WASD

Environment Stats let you know how smelly and noisy the area you're in is. 

Player Stats let you know your clout and anal pressure. Anal pressure is a timer til your next fart. If you're clout reaches to zero you've ruined the party.

GitHub : https://github.com/TheNickOfTime/GMTK-Jam-2018
